replies.body:
No we do not relies you are working hard. We never do. Why? Because you never let the community know what is happening. No issues are being brought up and it always have to be done by a community member. When the problem is addressed staff make sure that their asses are saved because that is more important apparently.  I am sick. I am sick and tired of the same shit that always happens. I have said the same thing on my thread that the community and staff need to work together but what happens? The staff say "I like this." or "+1" or "Nice job Pie for doing this." Only 2 mods were helpful in that. The Sr Mods and Flu disappointed me. The community does not want words. We want actions. Stop this stupid hiding and come out. We are part of the community to so why leave us out?

This was to all staff. Spart you have done a better job and I rank you higher then all of the Sr Mods. Please do not take it like it is directed to you

replies.body: Pay for the fucking Teamspeak server?

replies.body:
@Iron: You can say it a little bit nicer...

ON TOPIC: I must commend you on your efforts to help Avicus. We all want it to survive, and we all want to keep playing. Your suggestions on the Helping Avicus Thread are great recommendations. I know that senior staff is working on applying those topics. To be honest, Mods can't do a whole lot. We basically just watch over the server. we don't really make many decisions. That would be the seniors and up job.

Now don't blame it on them, because that is not the point of this reply. They are doing their best to get things done. I don't know what they are doing but I'm sure that they are dealing with a lot right now. Jozz is on leave atm and we really need an admins approval to finalize things. Yes, we don't have proof that things are being worked on like you said, but you will just have to ask the srs. I'm sure they are busy doing things, however I hope that they will reveal new ideas at the next staff meeting.

Hopefully that answered your question.

Regards,
Riley

I can work hard at work, I can still be fired. If the mods have done everything right, then it all lies with the Sr mods. I know this isn't the issue at all and I am not stupid. Again I do not trust you. I am doubting things that I know are wrong and I feel that I can doubt other things. The mods have enough power to hide posts, lock, and other things. replies.body:
Moderators don't do any work progression for payments or uptime for the TeamSpeak. Literally this will happen on slack.

Mod: "The teamspeak is down again."
Other Staff Member: "!admins"

1-2 weeks later;

Mod: "Someone made a topic about the TS being down."

And yet nothing gets done because only Kylo can pay for the server and NO one else but him.

reply_to.body_tagged: Guys, you realize that we're working very hard on this, and one of our services going down isn't going to be ignored.

replies.body:
Ok, thanks for the feedback. I'll take this into account and think of what needs to be done in the future.
Anyways, currently we moderators cannot do anything other then notifying the admins. It may take some time for teamspeak to restore back to it's original state.
replies.body_tagged:
Ok, thanks for the feedback. I'll take this into account and think of what needs to be done in the future.
Anyways, currently we moderators cannot do anything other then notifying the admins. It may take some time for teamspeak to restore back to it's original state.

replies.body:
Oh I agree, 100%. There are some choices that I believe the seniors and admins made the wrong call on. I can name multiple occasions. However, this is where agency comes in. Everyone has their own part to do in this community. If it be a player, a mod, a senior, or whatever. We are all working on doing our part because we care. Sure the admins/seniors might not be the most efficient people on the planet, however that is why we are all here. To learn. I would love to expand more on this topic. Can you elaborate on, " Again I do not trust you. I am doubting things that I know are wrong and I feel that I can doubt other things." I would love to learn what we need to work on and I will spread that through the whole entire mod team if needed.

Thanks for the feedback!

replies.body:
Wow, people are so aggressive.

You do realise that the majority of the staff team can't actually do anything about this right?

I understand that it's been a while now and that updates haven't been frequent but there's a reason for that. 
"The majority of the staff team can't actually do anything about it".

So instead of being keyboars warriors, I suggest you all calm down and be patient.

And yes, I know you've already been patient but you just have to hold out a little longer.

Oh and one more thing, yelling and swearing in all caps won't accomplish anything, it just makes you look like a dickhead.

How about you show some understanding and work with the staff team? Not against it.

Jesus, the only thing worse than the communication between staff and community are these pathetic threads by people who feel that yelling and swearing at the staff team will actually accomplish something.

Check yourself.

So instead of being keyboars warriors, I suggest you all calm down and be patient.

And yes, I know you've already been patient but you just have to hold out a little longer.

Oh and one more thing, yelling and swearing in all caps won't accomplish anything, it just makes you look like a dickhead.

How about you show some understanding and work with the staff team? Not against it.

Jesus, the only thing worse than the communication between staff and community are these pathetic threads by people who feel that yelling and swearing at the staff team will actually accomplish something.

Check yourself.

And then when people try and solve the issue, by creating a Team speak. Its IP gets archived.

replies.body: The moderators and senior moderators are not able to fix issues like this. I have made temporary channels on TS so people can still use it in the mean time. Apologies for the inconvenience!
